alert.note: Alert for Cobb (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:36PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Noses Creek at Powder Springs Rd at Powder Springs affecting Cobb County. For the Sweetwater Creek...including Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Powder Springs, Austell, Austell, Austell, Sweetwater Creek below Austell...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Noses Creek at Powder Springs Rd at Powder Springs. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Minor flooding continues in the woodlands and the natural flood plain upstream and downstream from the gage at Powder Springs Road. A walkway parallel to the creek on the right bank will be under 4 feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM EST Wednesday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
